thread.title_full: 2XL launches chic and classic home dÃ©cor collection | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: 2XL launches chic and classic home dÃ©cor collection
text:
(MENAFN Press) 2XL, one of UAE's leading home dcor and furnishings brands has launched its latest French inspired home dcor collection. A retailer of luxury home furnishings, the latest collection by 2XL draws its influence from the by-gone era of early 1900's. The influence of gothic forms, carvings and ornamentation has been kept to minimalist proportions to make the pieces eclectic and ergonomically comfortable. 

The collection of intricately designed Parisian looking accessories and furniture at 2XL consists of elegant plates, photo frames, vintage mirror trimmings and beautifully carved beds, ottomans, dining furniture and more. The delicate glass collection of cups, glasses and plates with meticulous gold trimmed calligraphy has been designed keeping in mind the upcoming Eid season.

Commenting on 2XL Furniture & Home Dcor's latest collection, Asif Rais Siddique, Operations Director said, "We are pleased to announce the launch of 2XL Furniture & Home Dcor's latest collection. At 2XL, we update our range on a monthly basis, and our customers enjoy finding something new every time they visit. The September collection includes a number of new additions to 2XL's existing Parisian-inspired classic range of furniture and dcor items. We have also added a beautiful range of serving plates and glasses that feature Arabic calligraphy. These pieces would be ideal for entertaining and gifting over the upcoming Eid celebrations."

2XL range includes elaborately carved pieces to minimalist chic sofa sets, bedroom furniture, and cupboards that are not only a delight to look at but also are convenient. The high-end store has an extensive inventory of wonderful and colorful accessories with stunning designs and textures, such as vases, cushions, showpieces, lampshades, mirrors and frames that can endow everyday space with royal opulence. 
2XL does not restrict itself to home dcor and furniture only but also has quirky functional kitchen accessories that can range from egg poachers and interesting chocolate molds to cutting boards and ice-cube makers.

Having created a premium brand name that exemplifies the best in home dcor and furnishings with wide-ranging designs and styles, 2XL believes in being entirely focused on fulfilling and exceeding the customers' expectations. 
2XL showrooms in the UAE are located at Marina Mall in Abu Dhabi, Al Wasl, Al Ghurair Center and Uptown Mirdif in Dubai and near Mega Mall in Sharjah. 

About 2XL 
2XL Furniture & Home Dcor is a retailer of luxury home furnishings in the UAE since 2000. The brand currently has 5 showrooms across Abu Dhabi, Dubai and Sharjah with plans of opening the sixth branch in Al Ain this summer. 2XL is a partnership between Royal Group and Mr. Mohammed Ahmed Saeed Al Qassimi.The 2XL product range includes exclusive bedroom, living and dining room furniture as well as exquisitely crafted dcor items, unique gifting ideas, plush rugs and gorgeous wall art, divine bed and bath linen, eye-catching tableware, and a fun, functional kitchenware range.The 2XL range is very classic and French-inspired. Each retail item has been carefully chosen exclusively for 2XL and denotes a lifestyle that is regal, sophisticated and of a finer taste. We have something to suit every home setting “ from ornate gold-plated bedroom settings to the more subdued Parisian hues of shabby chic, quirky contemporary inspirations to more ethnic Eastern-inspired dcor ideas.
